newsitem.title: SPAIN: Iraq to use Syrian port to import aid - Rasheed.
newsitem.headline: Iraq to use Syrian port to import aid - Rasheed.

text.p: Iraqi Oil Minister Amir Rasheed said on Tuesday that Iraq had been given permission to use one of Syria's ports on the border to import humanitarian aid.

"We have had a Syrian delegation coming to Iraq ...and we have agreed to import some humanitarian materials from Syria and we have enlisted the port on the Syrian border," Rasheed told a news conference during a trip to Spain.
Rasheed said United Nations observers would be present to monitor the port.
U.N. sanctions were imposed against Iraq in 1990 after its invastion of Kuwait.
